answers.answer: I was givin the diabetes test at 28 weeks .. They usually only give u one ultra sound unless you are over the age of 35 or haveing complications..

question: hey all i am going on 25 weeks-i have a drs appt on the 14th and i was just wondering when they are going to do the diabetes test. also, do u think they will give me anoher ultra sound?? i am still not totally postive on if i am having a boy-the lady was 70% sure-do u think i should add boy stuff to myt registry??
title: when do they do the diabetes test
